# Support

Need help with **Stremio Enhanced**? Hereâ€™s how you can get support:

## FAQ & Documentation

Please check our README and documentation for answers to common questions.

## GitHub Issues

If you have found a bug or want to request a feature, please open an [issue](https://github.com/REVENGE977/stremio-enhanced/issues).

## Community Discussions

Use the [Discussions](https://github.com/REVENGE977/stremio-enhanced/discussions) tab for:
- General questions
- Sharing ideas or feedback
- Help from the community

You can also reach out for me on Discord to get help from me or other community members. Link for server is in README.md

## Security Issues

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it to me directly on Discord via DM.

Thank you for using Stremio Enhanced!
